ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] ShowEQ Question
ygData.msgSnippet: First off let me say that *I* personally do not use show EQ or cheat on my income taxes. But a little bird told me that show eq does not let you see the tells
ygData.messageBody:
First off let me say that *I* personally do not use
show EQ or cheat on my income taxes. But a little bird
told me that show eq does not let you see the tells
between players but it does tell you every thing else.
Let me add that EQ is a game and you have no
constitutional rights inside the game. Heck, murder is
commited every minute in the game. I mean really what
did a Dervish do to you? Anything you type is public
property and can be seen by all of the EQ staff. /em
wonders how much of a cybor slut Renee is.
/jk


--- Renee' <Neysa40@...> wrote:
> First off, let me say that I personally do not Use
> ShowEQ or any
> other method of cheating in the game,... I just have
> a question about
> it. Can the person who is using ShowEQ see other
> players Text box? or
> can they see other players personal messages? If
> yes,... isn't that
> illegal? That's invasion of privacy!
>
>
